sections.summary: Motivated sales professional with 2.5 years of retail experience. Strong customer service skills and ability to work in team environments. Eager to grow career in luxury retail sector.

experience.title: Sales Associate
description: Assist customers with product selection and provide recommendations
Meet monthly sales goals through effective communication
Work collaboratively with team members to maintain store appearance
Handle customer inquiries and resolve issues promptly
Available for flexible scheduling including weekends

experience.title: Retail Assistant
description: Provided customer service in busy retail environment
Processed transactions and maintained cash register accuracy
Stocked shelves and organized merchandise displays
Assisted with inventory counts and stock management
